[Audio Format Error Codes](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1577851-audio-format-error-codes)[`var kAudioFormatUnspecifiedError: OSStatus`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudioformatunspecifiederror)An unspecified error.[`var kAudioFormatUnsupportedPropertyError: OSStatus`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudioformatunsupportedpropertyerror)The specified property is not supported.[`var kAudioFormatBadSpecifierSizeError: OSStatus`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudioformatbadspecifiersizeerror)[`var kAudioFormatUnsupportedDataFormatError: OSStatus`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudioformatunsupporteddataformaterror)The playback data format is unsupported (declared in `AudioFormat.h`).[`var kAudioFormatUnknownFormatError: OSStatus`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudioformatunknownformaterror)The specified data format is not a known format.
